subscription_expired: ❌ Your subscription has expired or is inactive. Send /preuve after payment.
subscription_validated: ✅ Your proof has been validated! Premium access active for 30 days.
joined_success: 🎉 Access confirmed! Welcome to the channel.
admin_only: ⛔ This command is reserved for the administrator.
help_base:
📌 *Available Commands* :

\/start — Start the bot
\/abonnement — View payment options
\/status — Check your subscription
\/codepromo — Your promo code
\/mesfilleuls — Your referrals
\/promo — Invite friends
\/preuve \<text\> — Send payment proof
\/acces — Get channel access
\/infos — Your Telegram info
help_admin:
👑 *Admin Commands* 👑 :
\/valider \<id\> — Validate payment
\/rejeter \<id\> \<reason\> — Reject a request
\/prem \<id\> — Grant premium
\/unprem \<id\> — Revoke premium
\/abonnes — View all subscribers
\/backup — Download backup \.zip
\/whitelist \<id\> — Add lifetime access
\/unwhitelist \<id\> — Remove whitelist user
\/whitelist_liste — View whitelist
\/nettoie_liens — Clean expired links
\/stats — Bot statistics
bonus_parrainage: 🔥 Congrats! You have 3 referrals. Premium extended by 1 month!

invite_friends: 🎁 Invite your friends with this link:
admin_no_payment_needed: 👑 As admin, you don’t need to pay. Access granted.
subscription_message:
💳 *Premium Subscription* — 1000 FCFA (~$1.65)

📎 Payment methods:
• PayPal: /paypal
• Wave: /wave 🌊
• Orange Money: /om
• MTN Money: /mtn

✅ Tap /acces after payment.
admin_no_proof: 👑 You're admin, no need to send proof.
proof_missing: ❌ Please provide valid proof after the command. Example: /preuve screenshot or receipt.
proof_received: 📬 Proof received. Admin will verify and approve.
status_expired: ❌ Your subscription is expired or inactive.
prem_user: 🎉 Your premium access has been activated manually by admin.
unprem_user: ⚠️ Your subscription was revoked and access removed.
no_active_subscription: ℹ️ This user has no active subscription.
